name: 戦闘不能
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
if(user.isStateAffected(390) && user.mpRate() >= 0.3){
  user.removeState(stateId);
  var value1 = Math.ceil(user.mmp * 0.3);
  user.gainHp(value1);
  var dmg = Math.ceil(user.mmp * 0.3);
  user.gainMp(-dmg);
  user.startDamagePopup();
  user.clearResult();
  user.startAnimation(436, false, 0);
} else {
  if(user.isEnemy()){
    enemy_dropSelection(user);
  };
  if(valueCollapseAnime >= 1 && user.isEnemy()){
    if($gameTroop.aliveMembers().length == 0){
      $gameTroop.members()[0].spriteOpacity(0, 120);
      pic_eraseP(0,[51,52,53,54,55,56,57]);
      $gameTroop.members()[0].startAnimation(valueCollapseAnime, false, 40);  
    };
  };
};
</Custom Apply Effect>

  state_addEffect1(user,target,stateId,261);
  if (target._stateCounter[stateId] >= 5) {
    target.addState(12);
    target.removeStateCounter(stateId);
    target.removeState(stateId);

name: リヴェンジ・アベンジャー
note:
<Category: InvalidDispel>
<Category: Bypass Recover All Removal>
<NoAddDescription>
<Help Description>
:ターン中に受けた被D×200%のダメージを敵全体に与える。[戦闘不能時は未発動]
[\I[77]\I[79]耐性-100%][ダメージ量は敵の数に応じて分散]\th[201]
</Help Description>

<Custom Turn Start Effect>
user.setStateCounter(stateId, 0);
</Custom Turn Start Effect>
<Custom Respond Effect>
user.addStateCounter(stateId, value);
</Custom Respond Effect>
<Custom Turn End Effect>
if(user.isAlive()){
  if (target._stateCounter[stateId] >= 1) {
    var value1 = target._stateCounter[stateId];
    var value2 = $gameTroop.members().length;
    if(value2 >= 1){
      BattleManager._logWindow.push(`addText`, `${target.name()}の\\SIM[${stateId}]が発動！`);
      user.startAnimation(509, true, 0);
      for (var i = 0; i < value2; i++) {
        $gameTroop.members()[i].startAnimation(132, true, 10);
        var value3 = Math.round(value1 * 2 / value2);
        target.gainHp(-value3);
        target.startDamagePopup();
      };
}}};
user.setStateCounter(stateId, 0);
</Custom Turn End Effect>

name: 自己再生(小)
note:
<Category: Bypass Recover All Removal>
<NoAddDescription>
<Help Description>
:ターン終了時、HPが99%以下の時にMP1%消費して
HPをMMP×1分だけ回復する(現在MPが消費%未満で未発動)。
</Help Description>

<Regen Animation: 245>
<Custom Regen Formula>
if (a.hpRate() != 1.00 && a.mpRate() >= 0.01) {
  value = Math.round(a.mmp * 1);
  variance = 10
  element = 12;
};
</Custom Regen Formula>

<Custom Turn End Effect>
if(user.isAlive()){
  if (user.hpRate() != 1.00 && user.mpRate() >= 0.01) {
    var value1 = Math.round(user.mmp * 0.01);
    user.gainMp(-value1);
    user.startDamagePopup();
  };
};
</Custom Turn End Effect>
